function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Scarcity of papers studying interventions in FM activities for respiratory infection control","Impact":"Lack of effective measures to control respiratory infections in the built environment","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to develop interventions for respiratory infection control in FM activities","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and air quality monitoring devices","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Research institutions, facility management companies, government health organizations"},{"Description":"Inclusion of non-journal items like conference papers, government reports, and commercial briefs","Impact":"Lower quality and reliability of the information and findings","Mitigation":"Strictly focus on peer-reviewed journal articles for higher quality information","Technologies":"Database filtering tools, quality assessment algorithms","People":"Researchers, reviewers, information specialists","Owner":"Database providers, academic institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of quantitative outcomes of interventions in background articles","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing the effectiveness of interventions for respiratory infection control","Mitigation":"Set clear criteria for inclusion of articles with quantitative outcomes in future reviews","Technologies":"Quantitative analysis software, outcome assessment tools","People":"Researchers, reviewers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"}]}
